page.title: 01A View of Harlington Hayes
page.content: Hayes is a nice place and has many facilities.In Hayes town there is a high street with many shops,including Sainsburys,Texas,Comet,Woolworth and Currys.Also Hayes has a main post office.Building societies and banks are very common.There is a small railway station and lots of bus stops The area is mainly residential with lots of houses,flats and masionettes. We have 3 parks in the Hayes area. There are 5 churches and 5 schools.EMI and Nestles have a factory and a Marks & Spencer store house which use to be a Mercedes Benz workshop.We have 2 swimming pools, Hayes and William Byrd and 2 sports centres, Hayes Manor and Harlington. The sports centres have badminton courts and other facilities There is an oil power station and lots of petrol stations. By Zoe Fisher & Steven Smith
